pages.title: Mobile Interaction Designer
pages.description: To guide the usability, design and feature improvements of our app **_Save_** Save, we’re seeking a mobile designer who will identify user flow/ux frictions, offer ux and design solutions, and create a roadmap of improvements to implement. .

pages.title: Decentralized Storage Researcher
pages.description: To guide our development of decentralized archiving options within our app, Save, we’re seeking a researcher who can evaluate the needs of our archivist communities and the potential of various decentralized storage technologies to meet those needs.
